title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Mastering University Learning Strategies Through Structured Education

context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: By the end of the 4-week course, learners can apply four core strategies (time management/exam strategies) contextually
Learners achieve scores improved by at least 20% in academic self-efficacy scale surveys
Through team-based projects, learners create personalized learning plans and present actionable 3-month roadmaps
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
